content.rendered:
THE GRAY MAN is CIA agent Court Gentry (Ryan Gosling), aka Sierra Hatos. Escaped from a federal penitentiary by Donald Fitzroy (Billy Bob Thornton), Gentry was once a highly trained death row officer for the agency. However, the dice have turned, and now Six is ​​the target. Lloyd Hansen (Chris Evans), a former CIA agent, is determined to hunt down and eliminate Gentry, helped by agent Dani Miranda (Ana de Armas) to stay one step ahead.

Directors: Anthony Russo. Joe Russo

Written By Joe Russo. Christopher Markus. Stephen McFeely

Stars: Ryan Gosling. Chris Evans. Ana de Armas
